title: Mahmood says Home Office 'not yet fit for purpose'
description: The home secretary's response comes after The Times revealed a report calling the Home Office “dysfunctional”.
content:
Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood has said her department is "not yet fit for purpose" after an internal report labelled it dysfunctional and detached from its core functions.
Mahmood, who took office last month, said the Home Office had been "set up to... [2861 chars]

title: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman to leave Strictly Come Dancing at end of series
description: "We have loved working as a duo and hosting Strictly has been an absolute dream," they say in a joint statement.
content:

title: Death threats for former French president Nicolas Sarkozy - less than a day into five-year prison sentence
description: A video circulating online shows an inmate in a Paris prison threatening Sarkozy who is serving five years for criminal conspiracy.
content:
Former French president Nicolas Sarkozy has been the target of death threats in prison - less than a day after beginning a five-year sentence for criminal conspiracy.
A video circulating online, which appeared to have been filmed by an inmate, showed... [1629 chars]

title: NHS health checks to include questions about the menopause
description: Despite the change - which will happen in 2026 - campaigners warn some women will lose out because the number who attend is too low.
content:
Menopause screening is to be officially incorporated into NHS health checks in England for the first time.
Women getting the checks - offered to adults aged 40 to 74 every five years - will be asked about the menopause and possible symptoms from next... [2909 chars]

title: Agatha Christie meets Mr Men in new children's books
description: Christie detectives Miss Marple and Poirot join forces with Mr Tickle and others for the children's series.
content:
In a first for Agatha Christie, four of the crime novelist's famous mysteries are being adapted for children – with the help of the Mr Men and Little Misses.
